lessons.title: Question: Div selector
lessons.interactiveContent:
What happens if we replace the h1 selector with a div selector?

font-style is set to italic for both the <h1> and <h2> elementsfont-style is set to italic for the <h1> element onlyfont-style is set to italic for the <h2> element onlyfont-style isn't set to italic for the <h1> or <h2> element

font-style is set to italic for both the <h1> and <h2> elements.

lessons.title: Question: Div margin
lessons.interactiveContent:
What's wrong with this code?

div is a tag selector and shouldn't have a preceding .There's nothing wrong with this codeWe cannot have margins of 10pxWe cannot style the margins of a <div> element

div is a tag selector and shouldn't have a preceding ..

lessons.title: Question: Div color
lessons.interactiveContent:
How many properties can we add to style a group of elements inside a <div> element?

As many as we wantOnly background-colorOnly background-color and marginNo more than 3 properties

As many as we want.

lessons.title: Question: Transfer
lessons.interactiveContent:
What happens if we replace the h3 selector with the div selector in the CSS file?

The child elements of div have color set to chocolateOnly the <p> elements have color set to chocolateThe div but not its child elements has color set to chocolateThe child elements of div, except h3, have color set to chocolate

The child elements of div have color set to chocolate.

lessons.title: Question: Child
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which are the child elements of the <div> element?

<h2> and <p><h1> and <img><h2> and <h1><p> and <img>

<h2> and <p>.

lessons.title: Question: Inheritance
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which property do the child elements inherit from the <div> element?

font-familyborderpaddingNone of the properties are inherited

Make sure to pick font-family.

lessons.title: Question: Non-transferable
lessons.interactiveContent:
What does this code display?

A group of <p> elements with a border around themDifferent <p> elements, each one with its own borderA group of <p> elements with a border around some of themA group of elements with no border

A group of <p> elements with a border around them.

lessons.title: Question: Parent
lessons.interactiveContent:
What is the parent element of the anchor element?

divbuttonpa has no parent element

Make sure to pick div.

lessons.title: Question: Boxes inside boxes
lessons.interactiveContent:
Why does the <div> element act as a box around the <p> element?

Because the <p> element is a child element nested inside the <div>Because the <div> element is nested inside the <p> elementThe <p> element can only go inside a <div> element The <div> element cannot act as a box around a <p> element

Because the <p> element is a child element nested inside the <div>.
